sections.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Paraíba is famous for Brazil’s biggest São João celebration and a lively coastal cultural calendar.

sections.title: 1. Festivals Overview
paragraphs: Paraíba is shaped by São João traditions, coastal culture, and strong folk heritage.

paragraphs: São João de Campina Grande – Biggest June festival

sections.title: 5. Festival Types & Categories
paragraphs: June festivities, religious events, music, and food festivals dominate.

sections.title: 6. Religious & Faith-Based Festivals
paragraphs: Festa das Neves and patron-saint events are central.

sections.title: 7. Music & Dance Festivals
paragraphs: Forró and regional music are key cultural expressions.

sections.title: 8. Folk & Traditional Celebrations
paragraphs: São João celebrations are the state’s highlight.

sections.title: 9. Food & Gastronomy Festivals
paragraphs: Regional dishes and corn-based foods feature heavily.

sections.title: 10. Carnival & Pre-Carnival Events
paragraphs: João Pessoa hosts the main carnival festivities.

sections.title: 11. Indigenous & Afro-Brazilian Festivals
paragraphs: Afro-Paraibano festivals highlight heritage and culture.

sections.title: 12. State & Municipal Holidays
paragraphs: Local holidays are celebrated with community events.

sections.title: 13. Festival History & Origins
paragraphs: Festivals grew from rural traditions and coastal trade.

sections.title: 14. Cultural Significance & Symbolism
paragraphs: Events symbolize faith, music, and northeastern identity.

sections.title: 15. Cost & Accessibility
paragraphs: Most events are free; major concerts can be ticketed.

sections.title: 16. Where Festivals Take Place
paragraphs: João Pessoa and Campina Grande are main hubs.

sections.title: 17. Best Time to Visit for Festivals
18. Local Customs & Etiquette
paragraphs: Respect religious processions and local dance traditions.

sections.title: 19. Safety & Crowd Tips
paragraphs: Arrive early for São João events and keep valuables secure.

sections.title: 20. Family-Friendly vs Adult-Oriented Festivals
paragraphs: June festivals are family-friendly; concerts are adult-oriented.

sections.title: 21. Festival Food, Drinks & Traditions
paragraphs: Try corn dishes, regional sweets, and coastal seafood.

sections.title: 23. Fun Facts About Local Festivals
paragraphs: Campina Grande hosts one of the world’s largest São João events.
Forró is central to Paraíba’s festival culture.

sections.title: 24. FAQs About Festivals in Paraíba
paragraphs:
Main festival?
São João de Campina Grande.

Best base?
Campina Grande or João Pessoa.

sections.title: 25. Related Festivals in Nearby Regions
paragraphs: Combine with Pernambuco and Rio Grande do Norte.

sections.title: 26. Practical Planning Tips
paragraphs: Book early for June and July festivals.

paragraphs: Paraíba tourism portals and municipal listings.

sections.title: 29. Festival Map
paragraphs: Key hubs: João Pessoa and Campina Grande.

paragraphs: Paraíba’s festivals celebrate São João traditions, coastal culture, and regional music.
